pos review: Location close to the kinepolis a movie theatre,  restaurants are available there.
neg review: not so close to the city center, requires bus and taxi or car to drive to the center.

pos review:
The location was great, for us.
We were staying for a film premiere in Kinopolis, across the road.

neg review: No air-conditioning (with an outside temperature of 40C !)

pos review: Breakfast was a good standard - basics done well.  It is the closest hotel to the port so I could walk to work.
neg review: I couldn't find the wifi access code in the room and had to go back downstairs for it.

pos review: Location was good, close to center, free parking and wifi.
neg review: According to the site my room would have ac, but it didn't. The room was clean, but the hallway and stairs weren't that clean.

pos review: The bed was comfortable and the free coffee is a bonus.
neg review: A Bar would be a nice addition

pos review: While they do not provide coffee etc in the room it is free downstairs in the bar area
neg review: It is sort of over a petrol station which at first I wondered about but it was not an issue.
